about_the_game:
Hatsune Miku Logic Paint S: The Evolution of Hatsune Miku Logic Paint -MIKULOGI- Now on Steam!


Experience the next level of puzzle-solving with Hatsune Miku Logic Paint S. This expanded edition not only features puzzles from its smartphone predecessor, "Hatsune Miku Logic Paint - MIKULOGI," but also introduces brand-new challenges.

＜MIKULOGI S Features＞



◇Over 350 puzzles to explore!
Dive into an extensive range of challenges, featuring new 5×5, 10x10, 15×15, and 20×20 puzzles in addition to puzzles from the "Hatsune Miku Logic Paint - MIKUOGI -" app. As you clear stages, unlock beautiful illustrations of Miku and her friends. Build your collection of artwork by conquering numerous stages!

◇Choose your favorite characters!
Solve puzzles in the delightful company of your favorite Piapro Characters in Miku's interactive room. They'll cheer you on and encourage you while you tackle the puzzles!



◇Piapro Contest Songs Included!
Complete puzzle missions to earn Stars, which you can use to unlock new songs. Customize your experience by setting your favorite tracks to play on both the home screen and while you're solving puzzles.



◇What is Hatsune Miku Logic Paint?
Reveal images by using the numerical clues on the top and left edges to fill in the squares. Mark unused spaces with an "x" to avoid errors, ensuring a flawless puzzle-solving experience!

highlighted.name: Welcome to Hatsune Miku Logic Paint S!

name: Hatsune Miku Logic Paint S

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Version 11 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Version 11 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

short_description: "Hatsune Miku Logic Paint -MIKULOGI-" has evolved! Hatsune Miku Logic Paint S is now available on the Steam!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
